short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that saves and restores websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduces a extension button that lets you save websites and restore all saved sites in a new window.

This is useful for temporarily keeping track of websites to revisit later.

Use cases include:
 - Keeping track of items to compare while online shopping.
 - Researching multiple reviews for a product.
 - ... whatever else you can think of!

Populate your listo today!

Logo created by the creative outlet from Noun Project.
